CustomField.description: Set of params depending upon action type For Link set this to a URL (HTTPS supported) For Create record set this to the object name For Navigate To Object set this value to the Id of the object (relative URLs should be added without a '/' prefix) For Video set this to the embeddable video link
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Based on Action Type, insert an HTTPS external URL or embeddable video link, record ID, or object name
CustomField.label: Action Params
